meanings.definition: A large, swift-running camel with a single hump.
meanings.sent1: Dromedaries can run very fast in the desert.
meanings.sent2: People in some countries use dromedaries for transportation.
meanings.sent3: The dromedaries in the race were determined to win.
meanings.sent4: The dromedaries moved gracefully across the sandy dunes.
meanings.sent5: The sight of dromedaries racing under the hot sun was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A domesticated camel of a breed with one large hump on its back.
meanings.sent1: The dromedaries carried heavy loads across the arid land.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on dromedaries for their strength and endurance.
meanings.sent3: The dromedaries at the farm enjoyed munching on fresh hay.
meanings.sent4: The dromedaries' humps stored water for long journeys.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the dromedaries at the zoo.
